text:

This is caused by the double slash in sfh/modules/bxe/bxe//images/buttons.png

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 18961
quick fix

this is a quick fix. i can't commit it since the relevant code is an svn
external.
how do we handle such issues? work around it in our own code, or feed a bug
report upstream?
anyway, i still don't understand what introduced the bug, and i should expect
that other bxe module resources are affected as well, although a quick test did
not reveal any other problems.
